item.title: Mode Control Panel Switch Lights – Mode Selector Switch Lights

remarks.para: Lights for any two switches may be inoperative.

note.para: A switch with one lamp operational is considered to be operative.

numlitem.para: Verify autoflight mode engagement using EADI Flight Mode Annunciations.

placard.para: Placard Mode Selector switch light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
